There was one other sighting in Ontario on or around May 5th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother-in-law and I were outside in his back yard talking when we both noticed a light fall from the sky. I observed a bright white light with a smaller red light that moved with it as it fell. His house is located about 4 miles south-southwest of Ontario airport. I first observed the light from above his house roof line. It looked like it was in the vacinity of the Ontario airport about 1000-2000 ft high (??). It then fell straight down until it reached the roof line. It fell in about 1 second. I checked the Internet for any planes falling or anything unsual but nothing appeared until I checked Mufon and found a similar report to what I saw. The case number is 28965. Question 2: The light was brighter and a about twice the size than a planes landing lights. Question 3: Looked like a helicopter light falling straight down.
Summary: White Light with smaller red light attached dropped from sky
